item.title: Need a little help with ::yell[317]
item.dc:creator: @Bretthearn Bretthearn
item.description:
@Bretthearn wrote:

urrrrgggg, any advice? I can’t get it…I used the Colorful yell system tut, but got the 100 errors afterwards…any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a little help with ::yell[317]
item.dc:creator: @Bretthearn Bretthearn
item.description:
@Bretthearn wrote:

ehh, Don’t need a tut for that, I think i got it, that would be entirely client sided correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Need a little help with ::yell[317]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“Bretthearn, post:3, topic:383362”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=479140.msg3507820#msg3507820 date=1298270910]

Hey, so in my yell system I ahve it so when an admin yells it says:

[Admin]Name - Message

Say I want to make Admin red, how would I do that?

This is my yell command

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); if(donator == 1) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Donator]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 1) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 2) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Admin]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 3) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Clepto")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Cookie]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Fire")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Santa Ftw]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ripper"))

I want to make The Cookie part purple, Santa Ftw blue, and Admin red.

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); if(donator == 1) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Donator]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 1) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 2) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "@red@[Admin]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 3) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Clepto")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "@pur@[Cookie]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Fire")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "@blu@[Santa Ftw]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ripper"))

Now was that really hard?
[/quote]

well see, I did that, but then in the chat box, it just says “@pur@[Cookie]”[/quote]
You need to modify your client to show colors in the chatbox look for some tutorials.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a little help with ::yell[317]
item.dc:creator: @Bretthearn Bretthearn
item.description:
@Bretthearn wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:2, topic:383362”][quote author=Bretthearn link=topic=479140.msg3507811#msg3507811 date=1298270520]
Hey, so in my yell system I ahve it so when an admin yells it says:

[Admin]Name - Message

Say I want to make Admin red, how would I do that?

This is my yell command

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); if(donator == 1) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Donator]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 1) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 2) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Admin]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 3) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Clepto")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Cookie]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Fire")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Santa Ftw]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ripper"))

I want to make The Cookie part purple, Santa Ftw blue, and Admin red.
[/quote]

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); if(donator == 1) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Donator]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 1) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Mod]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 2) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "@red@[Admin]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerRights == 3) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[Owner]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Clepto")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "@pur@[Cookie]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Fire")) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "@blu@[Santa Ftw]" +playerName+ " - " +command.substring(5); if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Ripper"))

Now was that really hard?[/quote]

well see, I did that, but then in the chat box, it just says “@pur@[Cookie]”
